description.narrative: By the end of 2020, government at central level and at decentralized level in targeted regions have the capacity to do an evidence- based planning, coordination, monitoring and evaluation of Communication for Development (C4D) interventions to promote a minimum of 12 essential family practices (EFP)., which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: The rights of children and women are fully integrated into and prioritized in sectoral programming, emergency response, and communication.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By the end of 2020, government at central level and at decentralized level in targeted regions have the capacity to do an evidence- based planning, coordination, monitoring and evaluation of C4D interventions to promote a minimum of 12 essential family practices(EFP).

description.narrative: In the context of the COVID-19 epidemic,;C4D interventions;were;planned, implemented and coordinated to promote essential family practices closely related to COVID-19.;UNICEF achieved results;through:;;Producing;2 behavioural studies (Quantitative and qualitative);relating to;COVID-19;to guide the interventions of life-saving;behaviours.;3 national C4D strategies;were;developed and implemented;;130 implementing;partners (104%;of target);at all levels;were;strengthened on the latest orientations;in C4D (theoretical foundations, good practices, monitoring;and;evaluation). This training enabled partners from various key technical ministries to conduct communication interventions in;multiple;programmatic areas;(Health, Protection, Education, Wash, Nutrition).; | Status:Met | As-of Date:13/01/2021
